title: UK PM Boris Johnson in India Live Updates: Boris Johnson meets business tycoon Gautam Adani in Ahmedabad - The Indian Express
content:

description: UK PM Boris Johnson India Visit Live Updates, 21 April, 2022: The UK and Indian businesses are set to announce investments and export deals worth over £1 billion, in areas from software engineering to health.
